description: Section 73 Application for minor material amendment of condition  2 (Approved Plans) of Full Planning application reference P110274 dated 05 February 2014 for proposed demolition of existing three storey building and erection of seven storey building for B1 office use on floors 1-6 and flexible A1/A2/A3 use on ground floor with associated works. The amendments are: realignment of frontage including reposition of entrances; enlargement of ground floor area; alterations to east elevation including removal of first floor set back; removal of circular stairs from north elevation; additional plant on floors 3, 4 and 5 and to roof.    ADDITIONAL PLANS RECEIVED; Alterations to wording of condition 14  to enable the ground floor to accommodate a B1a (office) use in addition to the consented flexible A1/A2/A3 uses.
decision_conditions:
DETAILED DRAWINGS/SAMPLE OF MATERIALS (DETAILS): Detailed drawings at scale 1;50 and samples of materials of the proposed gate to the service area shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority prior to the relevant part of the works commencing on site:

The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved and maintained as such thereafter. 

REASON: In order to preserve the appearance of the streetscene and safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the heritage asset.
